attributes.text:
Core effect “Scale”

This effect scales the specified element (and its content, optionally) by given percentages.
Width in pixels
Height in pixels
Internal helper function which sets element’s dimensions to the given values and (optionally) moves it to scale centered.

Returns the (computed) value of the property alternateDimensions.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #alternateDimensions}.
(Computed) value of alternateDimensions.

Returns the (computed) value of the property restoreAfterFinish.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #restoreAfterFinish}.

Initial value for property alternateDimensions.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property alternateDimensions with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #alternateDimensions}.
the default value
Initial value for property restoreAfterFinish.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property restoreAfterFinish with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #restoreAfterFinish}.
the default value

Resets the user value of the property alternateDimensions.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #alternateDimensions}.

Array containing sizes which will instead of element’s dimensions, if filled.
Flag indicating if element’s original dimensions should be restored after effect’s runtime.
Flag indicating if element’s content (font size) should be scaled.
Percentage the elements dimensions should be scaled from.
Flag indicating if element should be scaled from center (upper left corner otherwise).
Percentage the elements dimensions should be scaled to.
Flag indicating if element’s width should be scaled.
Flag indicating if element’s height should be scaled.
